occupation: Student Consultant - Project Management at International Consulting Network - ICON
headline: Data Analytics Enthusiast | Actively Seeking Internship Opportunities | Illinois Institute of Technology | SQL | Python | R | Power BI | Tableau | Scrum | Passionate about Crypto & Web 3.0
summary:
🚀 Greetings LinkedIn Community! 👋
Gratitude for joining me on this journey. I'm Raj Dedhia, a passionate Data Enthusiast decoding the stories behind the numbers and translating them into impactful narratives and tangible solutions.

💡 Journey Highlights:
My adventure spans Data Science, Machine Learning, Tech Blogging, and Education. Here's a glimpse into my journey:

🚀 Skills & Expertise:
- Proficient in Python, R, SQL, AWS, Snowflake, NumPy, Pandas, with a focus on Data Analysis and Business Intelligence through Data Visualization. 
- Specialized in Data Analytics, Machine Learning Algorithms, Mathematical Modeling, and Statistics.

🌐 Versatility & Contributions:
Beyond the tech landscape, I'm a multifaceted individual, indulging in tech blogging, exploring new places, and maintaining a fit lifestyle through exercise.

🌟 Professional Contributions:
I'm proficient in Python, R, SQL, NumPy, Pandas, and Power BI, specializing in Data Analysis and Business Intelligence through Data Visualization. My expertise extends to crafting meaningful insights using Machine Learning Algorithms, Mathematical Modeling, and Statistics. Whether uncovering market trends or streamlining operational efficiency, I thrive in turning data into actionable solutions.
Furthermore, collaborating directly with the Managing Director, I revamped client relationships with USA-based firms in Web 3.0 and Metaverse domains through effective communication of complex data insights. The integration of JIRA streamlined Project Management, leading to an exceptional 20% decrease in project delivery time and fostering improved communication and synergy in cross-functional teams.

🛠️ Skills Snapshot:
Data Analysis, Data Visualization for Business Marketing, Cross-Functional Collaboration, Content Strategy, and Tech Blogging.

🌺 Beyond Tech:
When not immersed in the tech realm, you'll find me crafting tech blogs, embracing a fit lifestyle through exercise, and uncovering new corners of the world.

🌐 Web Presence:
- Portfolio - https://www.datascienceportfol.io/RajDedhia
- GitHub - https://github.com/dedhiaraj2002
- LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/rdedhia1
- Power BI - https://www.novypro.com/profile_about/rajdedhia

📬 Let's Connect & Collaborate:
If you have inquiries or are keen on collaboration, drop me a message on LinkedIn. Excited to connect and embark on impactful endeavors together!
Email - rdedhia1@hawk.iit.edu
Cheers! 🌟💫

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.description:
• Led team of 7 and performed Data Mining and Cleansing, employing KPI metrics and statistical analysis to drive Predictive & Prescriptive Models. 
• Built data pipelines to automate ETL protocols, reducing overall processing time by 30%
• Created comprehensive reports using Tableau, Excel, Python, and MySQL to optimize ad campaigns at scale.

experiences.title: Data Analyst Intern
experiences.description:
•	Led data analysis & statistical modeling initiatives, managing large datasets with 10K observations using Python, SQL & Excel.
•	Developed and maintained interactive dashboards using Tableau & Power Bl, enabling stakeholders to monitor KPIs and make data-driven decisions leading to a 15% improvement in operational efficiency.
•	Designed & implemented models for data warehouse, utilizing star and Snowflake schemas to meet business requirements.
•	Collaborated directly with the Managing Director, enhancing client relationships with USA-based firms in Web 3.0 and Metaverse domains through effective communication of complex data insights. 
•	Analyzed and translated intricate data sets into actionable recommendations for stakeholders, driving decision-making and informing product development; facilitated a 15% improvement in user retention and a 10% increase in customer satisfaction.
•	Streamlined project tracking and collaboration by integrating JIRA, leading to an exceptional 20% decrease in project delivery time and fostering enhanced communication and alignment across teams.

accomplishment_projects.title: Healthcare Power BI Dashboard
accomplishment_projects.description: The Healthcare Power BI Dashboard is a user-friendly tool crafted to help Hospital Management Teams track patient visits, equipment availability, revenue, appointment waiting times, and feedback on medical services. Using Power BI and Excel, I built this dashboard with easy-to-understand visuals and smart features like filters for better analysis. The goal is to assist managers in making smarter decisions by providing clear insights into hospital operations.

accomplishment_projects.title: IIT-Merchandise Inventory Management System
accomplishment_projects.description: The "IIT-Merchandise Inventory Management System" is a web-based solution developed to address inventory management challenges at IIT, encompassing stock level tracking, product availability monitoring, and efficient order processing. By leveraging Oracle Developer and PHP, I built a smart Inventory Management System, showcasing strong SQL skills. This system streamlines merchandise tracking and sales processes, enhancing operational efficiency and optimizing inventory management for IIT's merchandise stores and facilities, ultimately contributing to smoother operations and inventory control.
